metadata.title: CVE-2015-0218 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability inauth/shibboleth/logout.php in Moodle through 2.5.9, 2.6.x before 2.6.7,2.7.x before 2.7.4, and 2.8.x before 2.8.2 allows remote attackers tohijack the authentication of arbitrary users for requests that trigger alogout.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
